DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacodynamic effect AZD2516 healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Pharmacodynamic Effect Single Dose AZD2516 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , two-centre , phase IIa pharmacodynamic cross-over study assess effect AZD2516 total number reflux episodes healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Provision sign informed consent Healthy male subject Age 1845 year , inclusive Clinically significant illness within 2 week prior first dose study drug History clinically significant cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , hepatic , neurological , mental gastrointestinal disease Need concomitant medication study
